briefdescription.para: adds 1-dimensional features in the domain.

detaileddescription.para: The value type of InputIterator must be a model of the concept MeshPolyline_3.

memberdef.argsstring: (InputIterator first, InputIterator end, PolylinePMap polyline_pmap, IncidentPatchesIndicesPMap incident_patches_indices_pmap)
memberdef.name: add_features_and_incidences

briefdescription.para: adds 1-dimensional features (curves) from the range [first, end) in the domain with their incidences with 2-dimensional features (patches) of the domain.

parameterdescription.para: is a model of ReadablePropertyMap with key type std::iterator_traits<InputIterator>::reference and a value type that is a model of MeshPolyline_3.
is a model of ReadablePropertyMap with key type std::iterator_traits<InputIterator>::reference and a value type that is a range of Surface_patch_index.
iterator to the first curve of the sequence
past-the-end iterator of the sequence of curves
the property map that provides access to the polyline, model of MeshPolyline_3, from the reference type of the iterator
the property map that provides access to the set of indices of the surface patches that are incident to a given 1D-feature (curve)

description.para: The following methods implement the requirements of the concept MeshDomainWithFeatures_3.

briefdescription.para: implements MeshDomainWithFeatures_3::get_corners().
implements MeshDomainWithFeatures_3::get_curves().

detaileddescription.para: OutputIterator value type is std::tuple<Curve_index, std::pair<Point_3,Index>, std::pair<Point_3,Index> >

memberdef.argsstring: (const Point_3 &p, const Point_3 q, const Curve_index &curve_index, CGAL::Orientation orientation) const

briefdescription.para: implements MeshDomainWithFeatures_3::curve_segment_length().
implements MeshDomainWithFeatures_3::curve_length().

memberdef.argsstring: (const Point_3 &starting_point, const Curve_index &curve_index, FT distance) const

briefdescription.para: implements MeshDomainWithFeatures_3::construct_point_on_curve().

memberdef.argsstring: (const Point_3 &p, const Point_3 &q, const Point_3 &r, const Curve_index &index) const

briefdescription.para: implements MeshDomainWithFeatures_3::distance_sign().

memberdef.name: is_curve_segment_covered

briefdescription.para: implements MeshDomainWithFeatures_3::is_curve_segment_covered().
Returns the index to be stored in a vertex lying on the surface identified by index.
Returns the index to be stored in a vertex lying in the subdomain identified by index.
returns an Index from a Curve_index
returns an Index from a Corner_index
Returns the Surface_patch_index of the surface patch where lies a vertex with dimension 2 and index index.
Returns the index of the subdomain containing a vertex with dimension 3 and index index.
returns a Curve_index from an Index
returns a Corner_index from an Index
returns Index associated to p (p must be the coordinates of a corner point)
The class Mesh_domain_with_polyline_features_3 enables the user to add some 0- and 1-dimensional features into any model of the MeshDomain_3 concept.

detaileddescription.para: The 1-dimensional features are described as polylines whose endpoints are the added corners.

parameterdescription.para: is the type of the domain which is extended. It has to be a model of the MeshDomain_3 concept.
